156 class PclProcessor
157 {
158 public:
160  struct clusterProperties
161  {
162  size_t size;
163  std::string type;
164  std::string colour;
165  geometry_msgs::Point position;
166  // Default constructor
167  clusterProperties() : size(0), type(""), colour(""), position(geometry_msgs::Point()) {}
168  // Parameterized constructor
169  clusterProperties(size_t size, const std::string &type, const std::string &colour, const geometry_msgs::Point &position)
170  : size(size), type(type), colour(colour), position(position) {}
171  };
